summary: After the death of a common friend, two french journalists go to Bangkok to end the quest of this friend: find an exclusive hidden footage of the 1969 moon landing.
cast: Kad Merad|Alice Taglioni|Peter Coyote|Chawanrut Janjittranon|Claude Perron|Etienne Chicot|Michel Aumont|Claire Nadeau|Sebastian Marx|Kate Moran|Gérard Jugnot|Olivier Baroux|Nattapol Micheli|Nicolas Giraudi|Jean-Michel Gratecap|Sumrit Varin|Aratchaporn Sathet|Pichai Mitara|Yotin Maphobpan|Tanakorn Rojsokij|Chalakit Rodsomboon|Punya Sukkajee|Amporn Kwanmeekong|Gumpanart Yamwimol|Komkrib 'Krib' Wongwirot|Suveeraya Thongmee|Chayopad Pootrepet|Jutamas Thaneemas|Duangsamorin Yoonyong|Nalyana Phayakkachat|Nutita Deewong|Chalwat Jirawarrankarn|Jean-François Malet
keywords: place name in title|city name in title|weatherman|dead father|buddhist temple
title: On a marché sur Bangkok
